'''1.20.6 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.20.6-rc1''' in the launcher) is the first and only release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.20.6]], released on April 26, 2024,<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-20-6-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.20.6 Release Candidate 1|April 26, 2024}}</ref> which fixes a critical bug.
